text: The Bombardier CL-415 is a modernized variant of the famous Canadair CL-215. It's a twin-turboprops amphibious aircraft used for water bombing. Some are used for maritime patrol. == Users == It is used in Canada, Croatia, France, Greece, Italy, Malaysia, Morocco, Spain, and the USA. Category:Civil aircraft Category:Military aircraft Category:Firefighting
title: Bombardier CL-415
